team.name: Kristina Milanović
team.text: Kristina got her Master of Science in Architecture degree from Milan Polytechnic University in 2014. In 2012, has founded her own fashion-photograohy blog and continued to manage it alongside making a career as an Architect and Interior Designer. In 2016, she has joined forces with Branko Milanović to co-found an independent design studio, 1102 Design Space, where she manages Interior Design and Architectural projects. Licensed architect in Serbia since 2016. Passionate about fashion, pets, photography, food and travel. Nervous when hungry and always organized.

team.name: Branko Milanović
team.text: Branko has graduated from Milan Polytechnic University in 2014 as Master of Science in Architecture. In 2016, a long time hobby and freelance practice as an Architectural Visualization Artist finally turned into professional studio, 1102 Design Space, co-founded with Kristina Milanović. Passionate about sports, photography, food and travel. Very serious about lunch timing and food delivery organization, cranky when sleepy.

team.name: Moke The Wiener
team.text: Moke the wiener/sausage dog/dachsund/doxie/hot dog/etc. has been member of our team since it's foundation in 2016. when we took him as a very young puppy. Eversince he has been supervising our office, barking at whoever comes to visit or passes by the office, and always in the mood for cuddling whether you feel stressed or it is just tuesday. Loves long walks and cuddling, if and when you find him not sleeping.

services.name: STILL IMAGE
services.text:
Architectural visualisation still image is a sneak-peek into the unbuilt future.

We use 3D software and ou know-how tools to create convincing, detailed images powerfull enough to convince clients into the project realisation.

Large-scale or small, exterior or interior, aerial or ground view, we have the same, effective approach to visualize and communicate outstanding architectural design.

services.name: ANIMATION
services.text:
If still image is a sneak-peek, then movie is a deep gaze into the unbuilt world.

A different visual language with its own perspectives to express architectural design.

All in our services we use the power of genuine storytelling and in architectural movies it’s definitely prominent.

Thanks to our well equipped studio with top-notch technology we are able to create animations from scratch.

services.name: VR | AR INTERACTIVE SOLUTIONS
services.text:
VR is the next step in the evolution of architectural visualisaton and design.

Virtual relity tours allow the end users to get lost in it and interact with unbuilt environments and see them in lifelike situations.

To immerse yourself and try our VR visualisations, visit our VR projects page.

home_text.text:
1102 Design Space is a Belgrade-based architectural and interior design visualisation studio founded by architects Kristina Milanović and Branko Milanović, with backgrounds in the architectural and interior design, which helps us greatly while producing visualisations.
The philosophy is simple:
Create beautiful, detailed and effective architectural visualisations.
We are experienced in producing still images, VR tours and animations for architects, interior designers, developers, photographers and private home-owners.
The studio can take on projects of all sizes and types, from small interiors to large scale architecture projects.
